# Watching a shallowRef array that is inside a store, from a Vue component

### Reproduction

https://play.pinia.vuejs.org/#__DEV__...

---

## Accepted Answer

**@posva** [maintainer]:

[You need `deep: true`](https://play.pinia.vuejs.org/#__DEV__...
